text: The Mangla Dam () in Azad Jammu and Kashmir, Pakistan is the twelfth largest dam in the world. It is the second largest earth filled dam after Tarbela Dam. The dam was built in 1967 with funding from the World Bank. == Other websites == * Pictures - Mangla Dam * Site of Jhelum where Mangla Dam is located Category:Dams in Asia Category:Buildings and structures in Pakistan Category:Hydropower Category:1967 establishments in Asia Category:1960s establishments in Pakistan
title: Mangla Dam
